title: Bug 117005Property editor view is refreshed for several times after click on report name in outline view.
description: Description: Property editor view is refreshed for several times after clickon report name in outline view.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: Bug 117005Property editor view is refreshed for several times after click on report name in outline view. Notice that property editor view keeps on refreshing for several times.
SR: Create a report design "new report1".2. Click on "new report1" node in outline view.3.
